hint: Push all dimension filters early into CTEs before joins, convert comma joins to explicit JOIN syntax, and ensure date range filtering happens first to reduce fact table rows.
Create isolated CTEs for filtered date_dim and other dimension tables, then join with fact tables using explicit JOINs. Consider materializing key CTEs to break complex joins.
Pre-filter all dimension tables into materialized CTEs, then join with each fact table separately. Decompose repetitive patterns to avoid redundant filtering.
Transform three separate CTEs into a single unified fact-union CTE with channel tagging, then apply dimension joins once. Use conditional aggregation for channel-specific metrics.
